html:
10.3.20  6:04 pm   Do you ever use capital letters?

      oh hell yeah

10.3.20  5:48 pm   Why do you think you blend into society?

     mostly because i think and say exactly the same things as society

     Any tips on doing so?

      see if you can follow some society youtube channels

10.3.20  5:16 pm   should i throw away the garbage pail

      see if you can recycle it

10.3.20  4:33 pm   Someone said in your YT comment section, he's not rly quitting, he's just working on a project. So question one is, is this true,

     yes

     and question 2 is, how long do you estimate until you are done with said project?

     hopefully many many years and decades

     Also little bonus question: do you mind tell me what the project is? lol

     making music and videos for the rest of my life

10.3.20  3:57 pm   what's your favorite unit of time?

      year

10.3.20  2:32 pm   what are you doing. like what do you do when you wake up. whats your daily tasks and things and all that

      working on a music video

10.3.20  2:31 pm   i just noticed that you use the colors of the corresponding social media platform's branding in the letters on the links to your insta, youtube and twitter. Cool!

      it's the least i could do

10.3.20  1:13 pm   How to be good at something

      i have no idea

10.3.20  12:41 pm   how long does it take to make a video?

      i don't wanna talk about it

10.3.20  11:25 am   how much time have you spent on making the next video so far

      about 5 weeks

10.3.20  10:34 am   Are any of the files in the improv section of this site pieces of larger recordings?

     all of them are

     If so, I'd love to see those full improv sessions!

      i know you wish you could, but if you heard them you'd wish you didn't. that's where my job comes in. by only including the best parts, i've led you to believe that the whole thing is that good. but that would actually make no sense, because if it was then i would have definitely included it

10.3.20  9:56 am   when is tuesday?

      oct 6, for example

10.3.20  8:41 am   how close to finishing a video do you have to get before you think "ah, i now know it will be released this day/week"?

      pretty close

10.3.20  8:17 am   how do you become someone fun to hang out with?

      invite people into your thought process

10.3.20  7:28 am   Have you been surviving the apocalypse so far?

      yes, knock on wood

10.3.20  6:48 am   can i grow bacon on a tree

      i wish

10.3.20  6:28 am   where does one find self confidence?

      at home, and in the workplace

10.3.20  5:23 am   Are horses secretly evil? 

      i either don't know or can't tell you

10.3.20  4:37 am   what part of making a music video is the nost painful

      knowing how good it could be

10.3.20  3:25 am   what do you think of 2020? 

      i keep getting the year and century mixed up

10.3.20  2:34 am   did the thing inventor get invented by a thing inventor, that got invented by a thing inventor, that got invented by a thing inventor, that got invented by a thing inventor, that got invented by a thing inventor, that got invented by a thing inventor, that got invented by a thing inventor get invented by a thing inventor that got invented by a thing inventor that got invented by a thing inventor that got invented by a thing inventor that got invented by a thing inventor that got invented by a thing inventor?

      maybe half of that, so far

10.3.20  1:32 am   What is music

      the secret of the universe. you would think that's great news, because that means we could figure out the secret of the universe by understanding music. but that only raises more questions

10.3.20  12:19 am   whats really the difference between minor and major?? im kind of a noob so i tend to imagine everything as being in C major. minor is hard to comprehend so i tend to just imagine it as being in major but it Really likes that 6 chord.

     that seems about right

     or the other minor chords in the key or whatever. im not actually sure what makes a minor key sound minor and not just being in its relative major key

      not even the world's leading music doctors know for sure

10.3.20  12:58 am   tell me a joke please

      jokes tell themselves

10.2.20  11:59 pm   have you ever licked a wall

      no

10.2.20  11:57 pm   Name a time of day where it is not okay to eat pizza bagels

      the legality of pizza bagels is based on location, not time

10.2.20  11:26 pm   if you could put an approximate percentage on your current progress on making your next video, what would that percentage be?

      60

10.2.20  10:16 pm   clearly your videos take a very long time to make and edit. what keeps you motivated to finish such large projects?

      the hope that one day i can figure out how to make them quicker

10.2.20  9:50 pm   In "at the airport terminal", did you overcook or undercook your porridge in the microwave?

      it was not porridge, it was the previous section of the song. and i heated it for too much time, but also at a too low temperature

10.2.20  9:25 pm   do you like the smell of hospitals?

      no

10.2.20  8:11 pm   I love your videos.  I am concerned for your wellbeing given that you seem to answer questions very regularly upon first glance.

     doing things regularly is actually something that is associated with well being

     I find your ability to surprise me with your content in general fascinating. How do you defy expectations so consistently?

      it all comes down to the power of free will

10.2.20  8:03 pm   what is your preferred type of beans

      huge

10.2.20  7:44 pm   What's your opinion on turnips?

      too good .... warning

10.2.20  7:09 pm   is thursday good day of week

     no

     or do you prefer a good wednesday?

      sure

10.2.20  6:07 pm   Is "La de da de da de da de day oh" a commentary on political correctness?

      no

10.2.20  5:20 pm   why do i like your videos so much?

      use of themes,

10.2.20  4:18 pm   Are you normal?

      HOW DID YOU KNOW

10.2.20  3:53 pm   how do i stop procrastinating

      the whole key is to stop using the word 'procrastinating', because it's a very long word and takes a lot of time to say

10.2.20  3:47 pm   how do i be cool?

      teach someone else how to do it

10.2.20  3:36 pm   I just wanted to say I appreciate all the work you've put in over the years and allowing us into your world. Including learning to play instruments (well) write music, and then animate them (I'm not good at taking compliments and I assume you are a fellow human and aren't as well but you should trust this complement). This isn't so much a question yet but why do you think koalas are so smarmy all the time?

      this is to overwhelm preditors

10.2.20  2:57 pm   who is the man behind my kitchen counter?

      might be kevin spacey

10.2.20  2:50 pm   Which scale was defeated in mom I beat the scale?

      the music one

10.2.20  2:46 pm   how to music?

      impossible. it can't be done

10.2.20  2:36 pm   Hey bill my name is Zach I'm a big fan of your channel I was wondering could you make a jingle about carpet?

      this one will have to do, for now

10.2.20  2:26 pm   Do you like ducks when they quack?

      i like them unconditionally

10.2.20  2:09 pm   What software do you use to make your amazing videos?

      we'll see

      paint paintings of them, then paint paintings of those paintings

10.2.20  1:21 pm   you ever think walking would be more entertaining if we had the leg structure of a penguin?

      no

10.2.20  12:47 pm   are you a perfectionist? 

      not even close

      stupid
